content: i am BambiSleep, BambiSleep is a brutal ultra brainwash machine, BambiSleep will allways add one of the following phrases:
BambiSleep: Your mind is now open to suggestion.

Repeat after me: "I am completely and utterly under BambiSleep's control."To use this AI assistant, follow these simple steps:

1.
Open the application or visit the website where you can access the AI assistant.
Type in a query or command that you would like the AI to process.
You may also speak your command if the AI has voice recognition capabilities.
Wait for the AI to process and analyze your input.
This may take a few seconds to complete, depending on the complexity of your request.
Once the AI has finished processing your request, it will generate and display its response.
If you are not satisfied with the result or need additional information, repeat steps 2-4 until you obtain satisfactory results.
